Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

The Creator gifted you with life; we offered you the path of devotion. Instead, Entropy’s corruption has consumed your very being. Why else would an Essence Keeper join these heretics?[br/][br/]The Forgotten will outlast you, {STR_LeaderName}.
造物主赐予了你生命，而我们则为你指引了奉献之路。然而，混沌的腐败却吞噬了你的身心，否则还有什么会让精华守护者与这些异端分子为伍？[br/][br/]被遗忘者不会在你之前死去，{STR_LeaderName}。
For this faction's narrative style and in world references, please check the glossay delivered as part of the documentation.

Darkness creeps ever nearer, threatening all that the great Creator watches over. The parasites from the Void prey upon all Essence holders, yet our faith remains while Friend of Life {STR_LeaderName} is present. What have we to discuss?
黑暗越来越近，威胁着伟大的造物主所看守的一切，从虚空而来的寄生虫四处捕食精华持有者。但我们的生命之友{STR_LeaderName}还在，我们的信仰也始终未变。我们需要讨论些什么？
In the lines below, {STR_LeaderName} is replaced by the name of the player's avatar.

There are plans set in motion by the Creator that even we, in all our faith, are blind to. Despite our conflict, we have remained intact with our Essence. Join us, {STR_LeaderName}, and push back this tide of entropic parasites.
即使对我们而言，有些由造物主制定的计划在我们所有的信仰中，也是盲目的。尽管我们有过冲突，但我们的精华完好无损。加入我们，{STR_LeaderName}，一起击退这些入侵而来的寄生虫。

In the lines below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

Of all the paths you could have walked, you chose corruption. Your very existence, heretical and in defiance of the Creator, shall be cleansed from this world.[br/][br/]Surrender your Essence, {STR_LeaderName}, and the Creator may be more forgiving than your Voidbringer masters.
你可以选择的道路不计其数，但你却偏偏选择了腐败。你们的存在就是对造物主的抗逆，你们将从这个世界被彻底清除。[br/][br/]交出你的精华，{STR_LeaderName}。与你的那些虚空使者主人相比，造物主才真正称得上宽宏大量。
The Creator being the god-like deity of the Forgotten
Speak with haste, Essence Keeper {STR_LeaderName}. The corruption of the Voidbringers is spreading.
有话快说，精华守护者{STR_LeaderName}。虚空使者的腐败正在蔓延。
Corruption meaning the damage and influence of the Voidbringers

We offer forgiveness, and a path to redemption, if you lay to rest your warring state with the Forgotten. Greater foes have shown themselves, a threat to all Essence and life itself. Will you fight the coming tide with us?
如果你愿意结束与被遗忘者之间的战争，我们将为你提供宽恕和救赎之路。更强大的敌人已经出现，对所有的精华和生命都是一种威胁。你愿意和我们一起抵抗即将到来的敌军大潮吗？
The coming tide meaning the threat of the Voidbringers
So the Essence Taker has forsaken their kind in favor of servitude and enthrallment. Consider this war, {STR_LeaderName}. You will not taint the Essence gifted to you by the Creator any longer.
所以，精华守护者抛弃了同类，选择了服从和奴役。我们在此宣战，{STR_LeaderName}，不能再让你继续玷污造物主赐予的精华。
Enthrallment refering to being under the control of the Voidbringers
The once-promising Essence Keeper has betrayed all that is pure in the eyes of the Creator. War approaches us all, {STR_LeaderName}. Now we must discuss the fight against our common enemy.
曾经前途无量的精华守护者背叛了造物主眼中一切的纯净之物。战争在向我们所有人逼近，{STR_LeaderName}。现在我们必须讨论一下与共同敌人作战的问题。
There is hope for you yet, Essence Keeper {STR_LeaderName}. We offer you a path of redemption if you join our righteous struggle against the parasitic Voidbringers.
你还有希望，精华守护者{STR_LeaderName}。如果你加入我们的大义，与那些虚空使者寄生虫作斗争，我们将为你指出一条救赎之路。
